name: Detroit Techno Ultra DJ Game
description:
Help the Detroit Techno DJs defend Techno City from the pandemic.
World renowned Detroit DJ's take on the global pandemic the way they took Techno music to the masses in this new edged classic game. Utilizing the backdrop of DetroitTechno the core of the EDM movement, help star Detroit DJs save their home of the music from the pandemic as it tries to invade Motown.

Game sales will help Detroit Techno artists, DJs and musicians who have been impacted by the pandemic.
